languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс-синтезатор{/g} недовольно шипит:{/n} "Я возражаю против подобной формы коммуникации с технобратом Авелем".

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс-синтезатор{/g} недовольно шипит:{/n} "Я возражаю против подобной формы коммуникации с технобратом Авелем".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}A hiss of displeasure comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-synth{/g}.{/n} "I object to such forms of communication with Tech-Brother Abel."

languages.text: {n}不機嫌なシューッという音が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス・シンセ{/g}から聞こえた。{/n}「自分はこのような方法で技術同胞アベルと交信するのには反対です」
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of displeasure comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-synth{/g}.{/n} "I object to such forms of communication with Tech-Brother Abel."

traits.locale_text: {n}不機嫌なシューッという音が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス・シンセ{/g}から聞こえた。{/n}「自分はこのような方法で技術同胞アベルと交信するのには反対です」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵合成器{/g}中发出了不满的嘶嘶声。{/n}“我反对与技术兄弟亚伯进行这种形式的沟通。”
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of displeasure comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-synth{/g}.{/n} "I object to such forms of communication with Tech-Brother Abel."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein missmutiges Zischen ertönt aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Synth{/g}.{/n} "Ich protestiere gegen diese Form der Kommunikation mit Tech-Bruder Abel."
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of displeasure comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-synth{/g}.{/n} "I object to such forms of communication with Tech-Brother Abel."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sifflement contrarié s'élève du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}synthétiseur-vox{/g}.{/n} « Je condamne fermement la façon dont vous vous adressez au technofrère Abel. »
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of displeasure comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-synth{/g}.{/n} "I object to such forms of communication with Tech-Brother Abel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sifflement contrarié s'élève du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}synthétiseur-vox{/g}.{/n} « Je condamne fermement la façon dont vous vous adressez au technofrère Abel. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un bufido de disgusto brota del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco sintetizador{/g}.{/n} «Me opongo a que utilice semejante tono al comunicarse con el tecnohermano Abel».
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of displeasure comes from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-synth{/g}.{/n} "I object to such forms of communication with Tech-Brother Abel."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks sentezleyiciden{/g} hoşnutsuz bir tıslama yükseliyor.{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Abel ile bu tarzda iletişim kurulmasına karşı durmaktayım."
